divs: sighting detailsi had just awaken from a nap @ approx 1845 on oct.15 2007,monterey, ca. & went outside to get fresh air. i was sitting in a lawn chair, facing south, the sun was just setting, it was a warm balmy, very clear sky, no clouds, no discernable winds...i then noticed a (only can describe as,pulsating orange-ish (golden) light, descending from the sky) and heading in my direction, about 5 miles away, moving rather slowly. as it got closer, i got out of my chair & moved toward the sidewalk to get a better view, trying to figure out what was that pulsating light(not flashing,not stobing) as it got closer i could see that the light was on the very front of the craft, in fact it was the whole front that was the light. i then saw my room-mates wife near the front door and yelled "lisa, lisa come out here!!!" she then came out & we both watched as the craft was passing by and over the roof-line of the apartment,approx 600 feet\altitude is my best guess. we could see that this cigar\blimp shaped object had no wings of any kind, no tail, no cockpit, no undercarriage, no propellers, no nothing, & it was not making a sound @ all, it was approx. the size\length of regular blimp, but was not a blimp, as it was passing overhead, we ran into & back of the apt. to the balcony and watched as it (slowly...65mph?) headed north...@ the rear of the craft we could see two small round (apertures..both had a pale blue glow)...we were amazed and because, it was from south to north like many commercial aircraft frequently travel, daily, & monterey's airport is south east of my lacation by about 5mi's, could only say it's probably a craft that we have never seen.....but we decided not report to the police, unless we heard ot read if others had seen it, and..it was not in the local papers or tv news that week....having seen an episode of ufo magazine on tv...i thought i would search for this mufon site(it was mentioned on the show) and here i am reporting now two + yrs later...i am not sure of exact month, it could be sept. or even november...it was during one our "indian summer" warm spells...i keep looking, have not seen it since.
Summary: Object seemed to descend from the southern sky, moving northward and continual descent to approx 600-800 feet/altitude.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Monterey
There were no other sightings in Monterey on or around October 15th 2007
